summary: Frontend testing completed for 3 new features: Due Dates Client dropdown fix, Recurring Tasks UI, and DSC IN/OUT modal tabs. All features working correctly.

issues: React DOM nesting warning: <span> cannot appear as child of <tbody> - minor warning, not affecting functionality

critical_code_review_comments: Minor: React DOM nesting warning in table components - <span> inside <tbody> causing validateDOMNesting warnings. Consider wrapping table content properly.
seed_data_creation: Used existing DSC entry (Manthan Desai - 12345) for testing edit modal tabs
context_for_next_testing_agent: All 3 bug fixes verified working. Due Dates form opens without JS errors and Client dropdown shows 'No Client' option (value='no_client'). Tasks form has Recurring Task switch (data-testid='task-recurring-switch') that reveals pattern and interval options when enabled. DSC edit modal has 3 tabs (Details, IN/OUT Status, History) that only appear when editing existing DSC, not when adding new.
